describeLang.en-US: See your Battlefield 1, V, 4, 3, 2, HL stats! Watch live game statistics, get our Battlefield APIs, Discord Bots, BF1 Server administrating and protection tools.

titleLang.zh-CN: 战地风云5 服务器OCR识别

describeLang.zh-CN:
在被称为BattleField的游戏中，该工具可以抓取加入服务器的用户名。名字是OCR。

假设使用对象是服务器的管理者。在战地V中，为了响应想要保持BAN信息，制作了的工具。
describeLang.en-US:
In a game called BattleField, the tool grabs the username that joins the server. The name is OCR.

Assume that the use object is the manager of the server. In Battlefield V, in response to the desire to preserve BAN information, a tool was created
describeLang.jp-JP:
BattleFieldと呼ばれるゲームにおいて、サーバに参加しているユーザ名をす取得るツールです。名前は、OCRでしています。

想定使用対象者は、サーバの管理者です。 战地Vにおいて、BAN情报を保持しておきたいというに応えて、作ったツールになります。

list.title: BattleField V Robot
list.describe: BFV Robot主要用于战地5中社区服务器管理使用，通过软件可以达到自动喊话，反作弊等功能，以达到改善房间内游戏环境的效果，同时将大部分甄别工作交给机器人来解放管理员，使社区服更容易满足24小时开服的要求。

describeLang.zh-CN: BFV Robot主要用于战地5中社区服务器管理使用，通过软件可以达到自动喊话，反作弊等功能，以达到改善房间内游戏环境的效果，同时将大部分甄别工作交给机器人来解放管理员，使社区服更容易满足24小时开服的要求。
describeLang.en-US: BFV Robot is mainly used in battlefield 5 community server management, through the software can achieve automatic propaganda, anti-cheating and other functions, in order to improve the effect of the game environment in the room, while most of the screening work to the Robot to liberate the administrator, so that the community service is easier to meet the requirements of 24 hours open service.
Run in the kook community robot

list.title: bfvhackers BFV Hacking Forensics Website

titleLang.zh-CN: bfvhackers 战地五黑客鉴权网站

list.describe:
Statistically based cheat and targeting bot detection was collected from over 50,000 players from different game modes, lobbies and regions to find the normal range of values for each statistic. This data also includes some of the best players in the world. The most common outliers in the hack were the headshot rate and accuracy of each weapon. During the course of the game, hacks were identified and then their stats were collected to further confirm the normal ranges.

Translated with www.DeepL.com/Translator (free version)

describeLang.zh-CN: 基于统计的作弊和瞄准机器人检测，从不同的游戏模式、大厅和地区收集了超过 50,000 名玩家的统计数据，以找到每个统计数据的正常值范围。该数据还包括一些世界上最好的球员。黑客中最常见的异常值是每种武器的爆头率和准确率。在游戏过程中，黑客被识别出来，然后收集他们的统计数据以进一步确认正常范围。
describeLang.en-US:
Statistically based cheat and targeting bot detection was collected from over 50,000 players from different game modes, lobbies and regions to find the normal range of values for each statistic. This data also includes some of the best players in the world. The most common outliers in the hack were the headshot rate and accuracy of each weapon. During the course of the game, hacks were identified and then their stats were collected to further confirm the normal ranges.

Translated with www.DeepL.com/Translator (free version)
